text: @realDonaldTrump Trump’s sole interest, re: coronavirus, is to prevent looming public health crisis from affecting his re-election. His lack of concern for health and safety of Americans, incl. his own supporters, is expected. We know he lacks normal feelings i.e., empathy or concern for others.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
